TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PerformanceCounterCategory extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents a performance object, which defines a category of performance counters.

span.span: Represents a performance object, which defines a category of performance counters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 创建或删除性能计数器需要使用已命名的互斥体的基础代码的同步。Creating or deleting a performance counter requires synchronization of the underlying code by using a named mutex. 如果具有高特权的应用程序锁定已命名的 mutex，尝试创建或删除性能计数器会导致应用程序停止响应，直到锁被释放。If a highly privileged application locks the named mutex, attempts to create or delete a performance counter causes the application to stop responding until the lock is released. 若要帮助避免此问题，永远不会授予到不受信任代码的权限。To help avoid this problem, never grant permission to untrusted code. 此外，权限可能允许绕过其他权限，并仅应授予高度受信任的代码。In addition, permission potentially allows other permissions to be bypassed and should only be granted to highly trusted code. 实例的属性显示在性能查看器应用程序的添加计数器对话框的性能对象字段中。The instance's property is displayed in the Performance Object field of the Performance Viewer application's Add Counter dialog box. 类提供了与计数器和类别的计算机上进行交互的几种方法。The class provides several methods for interacting with counters and categories on the computer. 方法使您能够定义自定义类别。The methods enable you to define custom categories. 方法使您能够从计算机中删除类别。The method provides a way to remove categories from the computer. 方法，可查看的类别列表时检索与单个类别相关联的所有计数器和实例数据。The method enables you to view the list of categories, while retrieves all the counter and instance data associated with a single category. 性能计数器将有关应用程序的性能数据发布。A performance counter publishes performance data about an application. 类别包括物理组件 （如处理器、 磁盘和内存） 和系统对象 （如进程和线程）。Categories include physical components (such as processors, disks, and memory) and system objects (such as processes and threads). 与相同的性能对象相关的系统计数器被分组到类别，指示其共同点。System counters that are related to the same performance object are grouped into a category that indicates their common focus. 创建的实例时类，第一次指示与该组件将进行交互，，然后从该类别中选择一个计数器的类别。When you create an instance of the class, you first indicate the category with which the component will interact, and then you choose a counter from that category. 例如，一个 Windows 计数器类别为内存类别。For example, one Windows counter category is the Memory category. 此类别中的系统计数器跟踪内存数据，如可用的字节数和缓存的字节数。System counters within this category track memory data such as the number of bytes available and the number of bytes cached. 如果你想要使用缓存在应用程序中的字节数，将创建的实例组件，将其连接到内存类别，然后选取该类别中的相应计数器 （在此情况下，缓存字节数）。If you wanted to work with the bytes cached in your application, you would create an instance of the component, connect it to the Memory category, and then pick the appropriate counter (in this case, Cached Bytes) from that category. 尽管您的系统提供很多更多计数器类别，你将可能与之交互最频繁的类别是缓存、 内存、 对象、 物理磁盘、 进程、 处理器、 服务器、 系统和线程类别。Although your system makes many more counter categories available, the categories that you will probably interact with most frequently are the Cache, Memory, Objects, PhysicalDisk, Process, Processor, Server, System, and Thread categories. > [!IMPORTANT] > 中的方法类将释放该计数器，并且如果该类别选择重复使用选项，则会重复使用的计数器实例。The method in the class will release the counter and, if the reuse option is selected for that category, the instance of the counter will be reused. 如果另一个进程或甚至另一个部分的代码尝试写入计数器实例，这可能导致争用条件。This could cause a race condition if another process or even another part of the code is trying to write to the counter instance. > [!NOTE] > 强烈建议在应用程序的安装期间，不是在应用程序的执行期间创建新的性能计数器类别。It is strongly recommended that new performance counter categories be created during the installation of the application, not during the execution of the application. 这样，若要刷新的已注册的性能计数器类别的列表的操作系统的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered performance counter categories. 如果列表未刷新，尝试使用的类别将失败。If the list has not been refreshed, the attempt to use the category will fail. > [!NOTE] > 与安装的性能计数器类别[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]使用单独的共享的内存，每个性能计数器类别都有自己的内存。Performance counter categories installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] use separate shared memory, with each performance counter category having its own memory. 可以通过创建 DWORD 注册表项 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services 中名为 FileMappingSize 指定单独的共享内存的大小\\*\<类别名称 >* \性能。You can specify the size of separate shared memory by creating a DWORD named FileMappingSize in the registry key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\* \Performance. FileMappingSize 值设置为该类别的共享的内存大小。The FileMappingSize value is set to the shared memory size of the category. 默认大小为 131072 十进制。The default size is 131072 decimal. 如果不存在，FileMappingSize 值`fileMappingSize`特性值`performanceCounters`使用 Machine.config 文件中指定的元素时，从而导致额外的配置文件处理的开销。If the FileMappingSize value is not present, the `fileMappingSize` attribute value for the `performanceCounters` element specified in the Machine.config file is used, causing additional overhead for configuration file processing. 您可以通过在注册表中设置的文件映射大小来实现对应用程序启动性能的改进。You can realize a performance improvement for application startup by setting the file mapping size in the registry. 有关文件映射大小的详细信息，请参阅[ <performanceCounters>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/performancecounters-element.md)。For more information about the file mapping size, see [<performanceCounters>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/performancecounters-element.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定是否并将其存在于本地计算机或另一台计算机上。The following code example determines whether a and its exist on the local computer or on another computer. 如果在本地计算机上不存在这些对象，该示例根据需要创建它们。If these objects do not exist on the local computer, the example optionally creates them. 它使用方法，以确定是否存在。It uses the method to determine whether the exists. 如果不存在和未指定任何计数器名称，或如果计算机是远程计算机，该示例将退出。If the does not exist and no counter name is specified, or if the computer is a remote machine, the example exits. 如果提供名称，该示例使用方法并向用户显示结果。If a name is provided, the example uses the method and displays the result to the user. 如果不存在，用户可以删除并重新创建与新。If the does not exist, the user can delete and re-create the with the new . 如果用户执行此操作，使用删除类别方法。If the user does so, the category is deleted using the method. 如果请求，该示例现在创建新并使用方法。If requested, the example now creates the new and using the method. 如果指定了实例名称，该示例使用方法并显示结果。If an instance name is specified, the example uses the method and displays the result. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.Class#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.Class/CS/perfcountercatcreateexist.cs#27)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.Class#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategory.Class/VB/perfcountercatcreateexist.vb#27)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否对象可以具有多个实例。The property indicates whether the object can have multiple instances. 可能的值为， ，或。The possible values are , , or . 有两种类型的性能计数器类别： 单实例和多实例。There are two types of performance counter categories: single-instance and multi-instance. 默认情况下，类别为单实例时它将创建并添加另一个实例时成为多实例。By default, a category is single-instance when it is created and becomes multi-instance when another instance is added. 类别被创建时应用程序设置，并且在运行时添加实例。Categories are created when an application is set up, and instances are added at run time. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不需要了解性能计数器类别是否多实例或单实例。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, it is not necessary to know if a performance counter category is multi-instance or single-instance. 在中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，则枚举用于指示性能计数器是否可以具有多个实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the enumeration is used to indicate whether a performance counter can have multiple instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须设置之前调用此方法的属性。You must set the property before calling this method. 否则会引发异常。Otherwise, an exception is thrown. 如果你尚未设置属性，此方法使用本地计算机 ("。")。If you have not set the property, this method uses the local computer ("."). > [!NOTE] > 若要读取性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权访问性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 若要读取性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权访问性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定是否存在。The following code example determines whether a exists. 它获取类别名称、 计数器名称和计算机名称从命令行中，如果给定了它们。It gets a category name, counter name, and computer name from the command line, if they are given. 它使用静态的重载方法，以确定是否指定名称存在于。It uses the static overloads of the method to determine whether the specified name exists in the . 重载被选择基于是否提供计算机名称。The overload is selected based on whether a computer name is provided. remarks.format: ## Remarks `categoryType`参数指定的性能计数器类别是单实例还是多实例。The `categoryType` parameter specifies whether the performance counter category is single-instance or multi-instance. 默认情况下，类别为单实例时它将创建并添加另一个实例时成为多实例。By default, a category is single-instance when it is created and becomes multi-instance when another instance is added. 类别被创建时应用程序设置，并且在运行时添加实例。Categories are created when an application is set up, and instances are added at run time. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不需要了解性能计数器类别是否多实例或单实例。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, it is not necessary to know if a performance counter category is multi-instance or single-instance. 在中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，则枚举用于指示性能计数器是否可以具有多个实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the enumeration is used to indicate whether a performance counter can have multiple instances. 与安装的性能计数器类别[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]使用单独的共享的内存，每个性能计数器类别都有自己的内存。Performance counter categories installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] use separate shared memory, with each performance counter category having its own memory. 可以通过创建 DWORD 注册表项 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services 中名为 FileMappingSize 指定单独的共享内存的大小\\*\<类别名称 >* \性能。You can specify the size of separate shared memory by creating a DWORD named FileMappingSize in the registry key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\* \Performance. FileMappingSize 值设置为该类别的共享的内存大小。The FileMappingSize value is set to the shared memory size of the category. 默认大小为 131072 十进制。The default size is 131072 decimal. 如果不存在，FileMappingSize 值`fileMappingSize`特性值`performanceCounters`使用 Machine.config 文件中指定的元素时，从而导致额外的配置文件处理的开销。If the FileMappingSize value is not present, the `fileMappingSize` attribute value for the `performanceCounters` element specified in the Machine.config file is used, causing additional overhead for configuration file processing. 您可以通过在注册表中设置的文件映射大小来实现对应用程序启动性能的改进。You can realize a performance improvement for application startup by setting the file mapping size in the registry. > [!NOTE] > 强烈建议在应用程序的安装期间，不是在应用程序的执行期间创建新的性能计数器类别。It is strongly recommended that new performance counter categories be created during the installation of the application, not during the execution of the application. 这样，若要刷新的已注册的性能计数器类别的列表的操作系统的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered performance counter categories. 如果列表未刷新，尝试使用的类别将失败。If the list has not been refreshed, the attempt to use the category will fail. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权访问性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 该示例演示如何创建自定义的每秒的订单数为多实例性能计数器类别。The example shows how to create a custom, multi-instance performance counter category for the number of orders per second. remarks.format: ## Remarks `categoryType`参数指定的性能计数器类别是单实例还是多实例。The `categoryType` parameter specifies whether the performance counter category is single-instance or multi-instance. 默认情况下，类别为单实例时它将创建并添加另一个实例时成为多实例。By default, a category is single-instance when it is created and becomes multi-instance when another instance is added. 类别被创建时应用程序设置，并且在运行时添加实例。Categories are created when an application is set up, and instances are added at run time. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，不需要了解性能计数器类别是否多实例或单实例。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, it is not necessary to know if a performance counter category is multi-instance or single-instance. 在中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，则枚举用于指示性能计数器是否可以具有多个实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the enumeration is used to indicate whether a performance counter can have multiple instances. 与安装的性能计数器类别[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]使用单独的共享的内存，每个性能计数器类别都有自己的内存。Performance counter categories installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] use separate shared memory, with each performance counter category having its own memory. 可以通过创建 DWORD 注册表项 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services 中名为 FileMappingSize 指定单独的共享内存的大小\\*\<类别名称 >* \性能。You can specify the size of separate shared memory by creating a DWORD named FileMappingSize in the registry key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\* \Performance. FileMappingSize 值设置为该类别的共享的内存大小。The FileMappingSize value is set to the shared memory size of the category. 默认大小为 131072 十进制。The default size is 131072 decimal. 如果不存在，FileMappingSize 值`fileMappingSize`特性值`performanceCounters`使用 Machine.config 文件中指定的元素时，从而导致额外的配置文件处理的开销。If the FileMappingSize value is not present, the `fileMappingSize` attribute value for the `performanceCounters` element specified in the Machine.config file is used, causing additional overhead for configuration file processing. 您可以通过在注册表中设置的文件映射大小来实现对应用程序启动性能的改进。You can realize a performance improvement for application startup by setting the file mapping size in the registry. > [!NOTE] > 强烈建议在应用程序的安装期间，不是在应用程序的执行期间创建新的性能计数器类别。It is strongly recommended that new performance counter categories be created during the installation of the application, not during the execution of the application. 这样，若要刷新的已注册的性能计数器类别的列表的操作系统的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered performance counter categories. 如果列表未刷新，尝试使用的类别将失败。If the list has not been refreshed, the attempt to use the category will fail. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权访问性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 该示例演示如何创建自定义的单个实例性能计数器类别。The example shows how to create a custom, single instance performance counter category. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType/CS/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterCategoryType/VB/program.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以从系统删除仅自定义性能计数器类别。You can delete only custom performance counter categories from the system. 您不能从类别中删除一个计数器。You cannot delete a counter from a category. 为此，请删除类别并重新创建您想要保留的计数器的类别。To do so, delete the category and recreate the category with the counters you want to retain. 若要避免异常，确认该类别存在然后再尝试将其删除。To avoid an exception, confirm that the category exists before you attempt to delete it. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权访问性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来删除和它所包含的对象。The following code example uses the method to delete a and the objects that it contains. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可能导致性能显著下降，而在计算机上的所有性能计数器在都检查的可用性。Use of the method can result in a noticeable performance penalty while all performance counters on the machine are checked for availability. 如果仅将写入性能计数器，可以通过安装应用程序和访问计数器时假定类别存在时创建的性能计数器来避免全局搜索性能计数器。If you are only writing to a performance counter, you can avoid the global search for performance counters by creating the performance counter when the application is installed and assuming the category exists when accessing the counter. 没有办法从性能计数器读取时避免性能计数器搜索。There is no way to avoid the performance counter search when reading from performance counters. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权访问性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定是否存在名为"orders"对象。The following code example determines whether a object named "orders" exists. 如果不是，它可以产生对象使用对象，其中包含两个性能计数器。If not, it creates the object by using a object that contains two performance counters. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 若要读取性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权访问性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法返回的数组对象从本地计算机或指定的计算机。The following code example uses the method to return an array of objects from the local computer or a specified computer. 它将为到类别名称，它对进行排序，并为用户显示的一个数组的数组。It converts the array into an array of category names, which it sorts and displays for the user. 重载选择基于是否指定计算机名称。The overload is selected based on whether a computer name was specified. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能确定的性能对象实例上是否存在一台计算机而无需指定要查找的特定类别。It is not possible to determine whether a performance object instance exists on a computer without specifying a specific category to look in. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权访问性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用静态的重载来确定是否给定实例中存在。The following code example uses the static overloads of to determine whether the given instance exists in the . 重载被选择基于是否指定了计算机名称。The overload is selected based on whether a computer name is specified. 如果指定没有实例名称，该示例将使用默认单实例名称。If no instance name is specified, the example uses the default single-instance name. remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须设置属性在调用之前。You must set the property before you call . 一次性读取整个类别可以是由于系统提供的数据的方式读取的单个计数器一样有效。Reading the entire category at once can be as efficient as reading a single counter because of the way that the system provides the data. > [!NOTE] > 若要读取性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中，你必须是 Performance Monitor Users 组的成员或具有管理权限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista and later, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免无需提升你的特权访问性能计数器在 Windows Vista 及更高版本，将自己添加到 Performance Monitor Users 组。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista and later, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 或更高版本中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要执行访问性能计数器的代码，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 你可以通过以下方式执行此操作：右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建为指定名称。The following code example creates a for a specified name. 然后，它使用以返回，其中包含的所有实例的实例数据中的对象。It then uses to return an that contains instance data for all the instances of the objects within the .
